name: Athena, the rabbit - Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
A fun puzzle about a home rabbit's life. Find what Athena is doing today playing this classic game!

Features
    • 6 real pictures
    • 3 difficulty levels (36, 144 and 576 pieces)
    • Relaxing and colorful mood
    • Zoom In/ Zoom out

If you like cute animals, especially rabbits, you will love it!
